choices.text:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company
Dear [Boss's Name],
After much thought and consideration, I have decided to leave the company. It has been a pleasure working with you and everyone else at the organization. The experience that I had here was unforgettable and I will always cherish it.

I would like to thank you for all your support over these years. You were instrumental in helping me grow both professionally and personally, and I am grateful for everything you have done for me.

I hope our paths cross again sometime in the future. In the meantime, if there is anything else that I can do to assist with a smooth transition, please let me know.

Thank you once again for all your support and guidance.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
